net.akami.mask.tree

Class DerivativeBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akami.mask.tree.Branch<DerivativeBranch>
      • net.akami.mask.tree.DerivativeBranch

  • public class DerivativeBranch
extends Branch<DerivativeBranch>
    Implementation of the base Branch class. The DerivativeBranch class brings two changes :
    - It adds a new value, the derivative value
    - It redefines the canBeEvaluated method, making it return true all the time
    Author:
    Antoine Tran

    • Method Detail

      • canBeEvaluated

        public boolean canBeEvaluated()
        A derivative branch can always be evaluated. If it does not have children, we can evaluate the derivative of it.
        Overrides:
        canBeEvaluated in class Branch<DerivativeBranch>
        Returns:
        true
